data.name: Bodacious Agents
data.detailed_description:
Enter "B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S."
  • Bombastic
  • Operatives,
  • Dedicated
  • and
  • Candid
  • Individuals
  • Operating
  • Under
  • Secrecy,
the highly classified secret agent organization. In this 3-D Platformer, your co-agents have been abducted by forces unknown on missions top secret! Take the dubiously tax-funded gadgets granted to you by B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S. and use them to save the world and your friends!

Features:
* Unique 1960's inspired levels with a retro-modern aesthetic.
* Engaging platforming environments, including the city rooftops, fully outfitted with items to collect.
* Unlockable outfits!
* A variety of gadgets to accoutrement your quest as a "B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S." agent
* 3 additional characters to rescue and then play as during your quest!

data.short_description: Enter "B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S.", the highly classified secret agent organization. In this 3-D Platformer, your co-agents have been abducted by forces unknown on missions top secret! Take the dubiously tax-funded gadgets granted to you by B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S. and use them to save the world and your friends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3610QM,2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660M
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8600 CPU @ 3.10GHz 3.10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 (1920x1080) monitor
